name: R4B-Specimen-R5-Specimen
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B Specimen into FHIR R5

target.comment: R4B `Specimen` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen`
R4B `Specimen.accessionIdentifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.accessionIdentifier`
R4B `Specimen.collection` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.collection`

R4B `Specimen.collection.bodySite` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `Specimen.collection.bodySite` - bodySite has change due to type change: R4B bodySite CodeableConcept has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 bodySite
R4B `Specimen.collection.collected[x]` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.collection.collected[x]`

R4B `Specimen.collection.collector` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Specimen.collection.collector` - collector has change due to type change: R4B `collector` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `collector`

element.display: How long it took to collect specimen

target.display: How long it took to collect specimen
target.comment: R4B `Specimen.collection.duration` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.collection.duration`
R4B `Specimen.collection.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Specimen.collection.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Whether or how long patient abstained from food and/or drink

target.display: Whether or how long patient abstained from food and/or drink
target.comment: R4B `Specimen.collection.fastingStatus[x]` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.collection.fastingStatus[x]`
R4B `Specimen.collection.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.collection.id`
R4B `Specimen.collection.method` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.collection.method`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Specimen.collection.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Specimen.collection.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `Specimen.collection.quantity` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.collection.quantity`
R4B `Specimen.condition` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.condition`
R4B `Specimen.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.contained`
R4B `Specimen.container` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.container`
R4B `Specimen.container.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Specimen.container.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Specimen.container.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.container.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Specimen.container.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Specimen.container.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `Specimen.container.specimenQuantity` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.container.specimenQuantity`

element.display: Kind of container directly associated with specimen

target.comment: R4B `Specimen.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Specimen.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Specimen.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.id`
R4B `Specimen.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `Specimen.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.implicitRules`
R4B `Specimen.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Specimen.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `Specimen.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.meta`

R4B `Specimen.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Specimen.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `Specimen.note` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Specimen.note` - note has change due to type change: R4B `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `note`

element.display: Specimen from which this specimen originated

target.display: Specimen from which this specimen originated
target.comment: R4B `Specimen.parent` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.parent`
R4B `Specimen.processing` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.processing`

element.display: Material used in the processing step

target.display: Material used in the processing step
target.comment: R4B `Specimen.processing.additive` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.processing.additive`
R4B `Specimen.processing.description` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.processing.description`
R4B `Specimen.processing.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Specimen.processing.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Specimen.processing.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.processing.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Specimen.processing.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Specimen.processing.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Indicates the treatment step  applied to the specimen
Date and time of specimen processing

target.display: Date and time of specimen processing
target.comment: R4B `Specimen.processing.time[x]` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.processing.time[x]`

element.display: The time when specimen was received for processing

target.display: The time when specimen is received by the testing laboratory
target.comment: R4B `Specimen.receivedTime` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.receivedTime`
R4B `Specimen.request` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.request`

R4B `Specimen.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/specimen-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/specimen-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Where the specimen came from. This may be from patient(s), from a location (e.g., the source of an environmental sample), or a sampling of a substance or a device

target.display: Where the specimen came from. This may be from patient(s), from a location (e.g., the source of an environmental sample), or a sampling of a substance, a biologically-derived product, or a device
target.comment: R4B `Specimen.subject` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Specimen.subject` - subject has change due to type change: R4B `subject` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `subject`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `Specimen.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.text`

element.display: Kind of material that forms the specimen

target.display: Kind of material that forms the specimen
target.comment: R4B `Specimen.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Specimen.type`
